CompositeFrame.Name: Deck Plan Example
CompositeFrame.Description: This is an example showing how one might encode a Deck plan for a double decker bus in NeTEx. It includes seat an, entrance and sensor equipment.

TimetableFrame.Name: Deck Plan - Train and Journey assignment Example

ServiceFrame.Name: Rail Deck Plan Assignment Example
ServiceFrame.Description: This is an example showing how one might assign a Deck Entrance to a journey so as to state which entrance will be at which point on the platform .
